The new update has lowered my enjoyment of the game in a way that when I try to explain makes me feel like my wording is inadequate. TLDR: Borrowed time isn't used by people anymore for the most part but still is very needed. Mettle of Man gets broken by a bug that if you are unhooked by an inquired survivor and then hit you get your 2nd stack but it breaks Mettle of Man completely. Gens needed to be slowed down but now every killer uses slow down perks and makes the games drag out in a way that feels heavy handed. Solo queue feels like awful to play. That all being said I understand they wanted to mix up the game but I wouldn't recommend the game in this state.

New patch 6.1 has completely ruined the game for me. I'm hoping behaviour learns from this mistake and makes changes just like how Deceit made some major changes but then fixed things after a short while
The game is much more fun with friends. Tons and tons of toxic killers which can be really frustrating, but it is a very fun game overall.

这波改动完全是看哪个技能出场率高削弱哪个，zzz怕不是招到了隔壁一个反恐游戏的设计师，这种平衡方式你们怎么想得出来？这样以后只会导致越来越多的技能被削弱，最后双方的体验都如狗屎，人类修不动机器、救不了人，屠夫砍不到人，一把游戏时间越拖越长，最后没人再愿意玩了。
就算你的目的是让玩家可以打造多元化的技能组合，体验你们设计出来的不同技能，但有些非常硬性的基本技能是不能动的，一改直接就是两个游戏体验。比如自我治疗，单排人类有没有这个技能完全是两个体验好吧。虽然内心之力可以替代，但是在当前萨满遍地的情况下怎么触发？你们真的有在上线前体验过这些改动吗？

If you're new, this game is not friendly to you at all.  The level of grind you have to make in order to get the better tier perks is huge.  Then, even you make the grind to unlock the stuff you care about, BHVR will undo all that progress.  If you're new, I highly recommend avoiding this game.  If you got a dedicated group that plays this game, then maybe.  But this game demands too much.

I used to love playing this game but with every update it gets worse and worse. It is so unbalanced. There are games were: I've had teammates die in the first minute of the game, I've made it without getting hooked at all and then I get one-tapped and murdered, the killers camp bodies on the hook at the beginning of the game, and games were all the survivors die before one generator is completed. And then you have all the people that are killer mains and play a survivor one time, "SurViVoR iSn'T ThAT bAd aT aLL". At first I was angry, now I'm just sad. Could have been a cool game, or was but as I said it just gets more and more unplayable as a survivor with each update. So save your money, time, and frustration. Just play Friday the 13th instead. Or maybe someone will come out with a similar game that's more enjoyable. You win some, you lose some. But this game is 99% loss.
Game was fun years ago, now it's heavily killer favored.

The game can be very fun but can get repetitive, and when the developers answer to this is to not add or change things to give it more replay ability but to make the already tedious grind of the game 3 times longer to try and extend its lifespan i cannot reccomend the game on such clear acts from developers to screw over their community.

Desastroso. Lo juego desde el 2016 y jamás lo vi tan roto. La segunda partida que juego después de la nueva actualización se crashea el juego. Esta muchísimo más desbalanceado que antes, es literalmente injugable para los supervivientes. Y encima tira bajones de fps en el menú de inicio (con una 1660 y un ryzen 5). Si sos nuevo, no lo compres, esperá que lo arreglen o compra otra cosa. Si lo venis jugando ya hace un tiempo, comentá de forma negativa así los desarrolladores píerden en ventas y arreglan algo.... El juego excelente, el desarrollo lamentable.

This game was absolutely ruined with the most recent update. If I could get a refund after 754 hours, I would. 

Do NOT waste your money on a game where the devs can't decide who to favor. Killers or Survivors. 

If you like being tunneled, face camped, and being chased by killers with increased speed that you can never match or obtain this game is for you. OR, if you just want to waste money on garbage, this is a perfect fit. 

To whomever is reading this, gg. You lost the game. Well played Behavior for ruining a good thing. 

@Devs please include tent and s'mores charms for killers who camp.

I love dead by daylight, But unfortunately i cannot in good faith say that it is a game worth playing. I've been playing on and off since release and have put up with my fair share of crap that the developers have done. But time and time again they have shown that they do not give a fuck about the player base, and only ever care about bringing in new players who can spend more money. 
Avoid this game unless you want a development team that spits in your face and then demands you thank them for it.
Terrible balance, and god awful bugs with every patch.

К сожалению играть в этот проект после 19.07.2022 не имеет смысла, т.к. маньяки баффнуты по всем аспектам, в то время как сурвы занерфлены по всем аспектам. Туннелинг от маньяков теперь еще легче чем раньше. Есть два выхода как получить наслаждение от игры: Взять всё на генраш и с пятой попытки против слабого мана выиграть. Либо же упасть в первую минуту игры и ливнуть не подарив очки маньяку. Подождать 5 минут. Повторить процедуру. Перки которые должны были формально заменить мету урезаны. Анимация спрыга с плеча от осколка  длящаяся 50% всего стана маньяка, который теперь всего лишь 3 секунды, и через полторы секунды ты снова лежишь не. Особенно не советую играть новичкам, так как с перками победить невозможно, а без них и предметов и подавно.
